quotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama
